channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rescue mission helicopter crashes on Mount Kilimanjaro, killing all 5 on board
item.description: Five people have died after a helicopter crashed on Africaâ€™s highest mountain, Mount Kilimanjaro, in Tanzania

item.title: Celebrating 40 magical years of Chris Van Allsburg's "The Polar Express"
item.description: This year marks the 40th anniversary of Chris Van Allsburg's beloved children's book, "The Polar Express." He tells CBS News' Bradley Blackburn about ...

item.title: Rescue helicopter crashes on Mount Kilimanjaro
item.description: Two foreigners, a local doctor, a tour guide and the pilot were killed in the helicopter crash on Mount Kilimanjaro.

item.title: More severe weather in store for a soaked California
item.description: More severe weather is forecast for an already soaked California, raising risk of additional mudslides and debris flows.

item.title: Virtual reality opens doors for older people to build closer connections in real life
Storm system threatens more rainfall Christmas Day over waterlogged Southern California

item.title: King Charles and royal family, minus Andrew, gather for Christmas
item.description: King Charles III led his family to church on foot ahead of his annual Christmas Day speech that is expected to focus on pilgrimage.

item.title: WATCH: Sisters send more than 16,000 greeting cards to honor late grandfather
item.description: For a third straight holiday season, three sisters are honoring their late grandfather by spreading kindness through handwritten notes.

item.title: WATCH: Flood emergency in California
item.description: The state of California is under a state of emergency as 40+ million brace for potential catastrophic rains.

item.title: $1.8 billion Christmas Eve Powerball jackpot won by single ticket sold in Arkansas
item.description: The Christmas Eve Powerball jackpot worth $1.817 billion, the second-largest ever, was won by a single ticket sold in Arkansas.

item.title: WATCH: The love of singing and joy this holiday season
item.description: Pierre Thomas has the story of spreading unity and acceptance through the power of song this holiday season.
